name: Superhero Dentist Adventure Free 2 - The Drilling Continues
name_original: Superhero Dentist Adventure Free 2 - The Drilling Continues
description:
The dentist is back! This time with 4 more superheroes who need their teeth fixing!

Starring 4 Awesome Superheroes, Superhero Dentist 2 brings all the fun of the number 1 original app, with new heroes!

Replace teeth with different shapes, paint them different colors, use stickers to decorate and much much more!

You can even share your work using the built in Email or Twitter feature!

So to save our city, let's keep these superheroes looking good!!
